summary: This document is a template or guide explaining the structure and fields included in T-Mobile subscriber information reports provided in response to legal requests. It details the types of data rows (Subscriber, Account, Device, Billing) and lists contact information for various Mobile Virtual Network Operator (MVNO) partners.
keyFacts: The document is a template for subscriber data reports from T-Mobile, likely used in response to subpoenas or legal requests in investigations.

It outlines comprehensive data fields including subscriber personal details (name, address, SSN, birth date), account details, device information (phone model, IMEI, SIM data), and billing information.
It lists numerous MVNO (Mobile Virtual Network Operator) brands and their legal/compliance contact information, indicating these partners must be contacted separately for subscriber data.
The document references file identifiers (EFTA00072587 through EFTA00072592), suggesting it is part of a series of records or exhibits.
